Verses: 1 melum Thiriththa Melliya Panjunoolinaalum Ilaneelanoolinaalum Raththaambara Noolinaalum Sivappunoolinaalum Neyyappatta Paththu Moodudhiraigalaal Vaasasthalaththai Undupannuvaayaaga; Avaigalil Visiththiravelaiyaaik Kerubeengalaich Seyyakkadavaai.
2 ovvoru Moodudhiraiyum Iruvaththettu Muzha Neelamum Naalu Muzha Agalamumaayiruppadhaaga; Moodudhiraigalellaam Ore Alavaayirukkavendum.
3 aindhu Moodudhirai Ondrodondru Inaikkappattirukkavendum; Matra Aindhu Moodudhiraigalum Ondrodondru Inaikkappattirukkavendum.
4 inaikkappatta Oru Moodudhiraiyin Kadai Oraththil Ilaneelanoolaal Kaadhugalai Undupannu; Inaikkappatta Matra Moodudhiraiyin Kadaioraththilum Appadiye Seyvaayaaga.
5 kaadhugal Ondrodondru Inaiyumbadi Oru Moodudhiraiyil Aimbadhu Kaadhugalaiyum, Inaikkappatta Matra Moodudhiraiyin Oraththil Aimbadhu Kaadhugalaiyum Undupannuvaayaaga.
6 aimbadhu Pon Kokkigalaiyum Panni, Moodudhiraigalai Ondrodondru Andhak Kokkigalaal Inaiththuviduvaayaaga, Appozhudhu Adhu Ore Vaasasthalamaagum.
7 vaasasthalaththinmel Koodaaramaagap Podumbadi Aattumayiraal Padhinoru Moodudhiraigalai Undupannuvaayaaga.
8 ovvoru Moodudhirai Muppadhu Muzha Neelamum Naalu Muzha Agalamumaai Irukkavendum; Padhinoru Moodudhiraigalum Ore Alavaayirukkavendum.
9 aindhu Moodudhiraigalai Ondraagavum, Aaru Moodudhiraigalai Ondraakavum Inaikkavendum; Aaraam Moodudhiraiyaik Kootaaraththin Mugappirku Munne Madiththup Poduvaayaaga.
10 inaikkappatta Oru Moodudhiraiyin Kadai Oraththil Aimbadhu Kaadhugalaiyum, Inaikkappatta Matra Moodudhiraiyin Oraththil Aimbadhu Kaadhugalaiyum Undupanni,
11 aimbadhu Vengalak Kokkigalaich Seydhu, Kokkigalaik Kaadhugalil Maatti, Ore Koodaaramaagumbadi Adhai Inaiththu Viduvaayaaga.
12 koodaaraththin Moodudhiraigalil Michchamaana Paadhi Moodudhirai Vaasasthalaththin Pinburaththil Thongavendum.
13 koodaaraththinudaiya Moodudhiraigalin Neelaththile Meedhiyaanadhil, Indhappuraththil Oru Muzhamum Andhappuraththin Oru Muzhamum Vaasasthalaththai Moodumbadi Adhin Pakkangalile Thongavendum.
14 sivappuththeerndha Aattukkadaath Tholinaal Koodaaraththirku Oru Moodiyaiyum, Adhinmel Thagasuththolaal Oru Moodiyaiyum Undupannuvaayaaga.
15 vaasasthalaththukku Nimirndhunirkum Palagaigalaiyum Seeththim Maraththaal Undupannuvaayaaga.
16 ovvoru Palagaiyum Paththu Muzha Neelamum Ondrarai Muzha Agalamumaai Irukkavendum.
17 ovvoru Palagaikkum Ondrotondru Oththu Isaindhirukkum Irandu Kazhundhugal Irukkavendum; Vaasasthalaththin Palagaigalukkellaam Ippadiye Seyvaayaaga.
18 vaasasthalaththukkaagach Seyyappadugira Palagaigalil Iruvadhu Palagai Therke Thendhisaikku Edhiraaga Nirkakkadavadhu.

19 andha Iruvadhu Palagaigalinkeezhe Vaikkum Naarpadhu Vellip Paadhangalai Undupannuvaayaaga; Oru Palagaiyin Keezh Adhin Irandu Kazhundhugalukkum Irandu Paadhangalum, Matrap Palagaiyin Keezh Adhin Irandu Kazhundhugalukkum Irandu Paadhangalum Irukkavendum.
20 vaasasthalaththin Marupakkamaagiya Vadapuraththilum Iruvadhu Palagaigalaiyum,
21 avaigalinkeezh Naarpadhu Vellippaadhangalaiyum Undupannuvaayaaga; Oru Palagaiyinkeezh Irandu Paadhangalum, Matrap Palagaiyinkeezh Irandu Paadhangalum Irukkavendum.
22 vaasasthalaththin Merpuraththirku Aaru Palagaigalaiyum,
23 vaasasthalaththin Irupakkaththilumulla Moolaigalukku Irandu Palagaigalaiyum Undupannuvaayaaga.
24 avaigal Keezhe Isaikkappattirukkavendum; Meleyum Oru Valaiyaththinaal Isaikkappattirukkavendum; Irandu Moolaigalukkum Appadiye Irukkavendum; Avaigal Irandu Moolaigalukkaagum.
25 andhappadi Ettup Palagaigal Irukkavendum; Ovvoru Palagaiyin Keezh Irandu Irandu Paadhangalaagap Padhinaaru Vellip Paadhangalum Irukkavendum.
26 seeththim Maraththaal Vaasasthalaththin Oru Pakkaththup Palagaigalukku Aindhu Thaazhppaalgalaiyum,
27 vaasasthalaththin Marupakkaththup Palagaigalukku Aindhu Thaazhppaalgalaiyum, Vaasasthalaththin Merpuramaana Pinpakkaththup Palagaigalukku Aindhu Thaazhppaalgalaiyum Pannuvaayaaga.
28 naduththaazhppaal Oru Munai Thodangi Marumunaimattum Palagaigalin Maiyaththil Uruvap Paaichchappattirukkavendum.
29 palagaigalaip Pondhakattaal Moodi, Thaazhppaalgalin Idangalaagiya Avaigalin Valaiyangalaip Ponninaal Panni, Thaazhppaalgalaip Pondhakattaal Moodakkadavaai.
30 ivvidhamaaga Malaiyinmel Unakkuk Kaanbikkappatta Maadhiriyinbadiye Vaasasthalaththai Niruththuvaayaaga.

31 ilaneelanoolum Raththaambaranoolum Sivappunoolum Thiriththa Melliya Panjunoolumaana Ivatraal Oru Thiraichcheelaiyai Undupannakkadavaai; Adhile Visiththiravelaiyaal Seyyappatta Kerubeengal Vaikkappadavendum.

32 seeththim Maraththinaal Seydhu, Pondhakattaal Moodappatta Naalu Thoongalile Adhaith Thongavidu; Andhath Thoongal Naalu Vellip Paadhangalmel Nirkavum, Avaigalin Kokkigal Ponninaal Seyyappadavum Vendum.

33 kokkigalinkeezhe Andhath Thiraichcheelaiyaith Thongavittu, Saatchippettiyai Ange Thiraikkullaaga Vaikkakkadavaai; Andhath Thiraichcheelai Parisuththa Sthalaththirkum Magaa Parisuththa Sthalaththirkum Pirivai Undaakkum.
34 magaa Parisuththa Sthalaththile Saatchip Pettiyinmeedhil Kirubaasanaththai Vaippaayaaga;
35 thiraikkup Purambaaga Mejaiyaiyum Mejaikku Edhire Vaasasthalaththin Thenpuramaagak Kuththuvilakkaiyum Vaiththu, Mejaiyai Vadapuramaaga Vaippaayaaga.
36 ilaneelanoolum Raththaambaranoolum Sivappunoolum Thiriththa Melliya Panjunoolumaagiya Ivatraal Siththirath Thaiyal Velaiyaana Oru Thongudhiraiyum Koodaaraththin Vaasalukku Undaakki,

37 andhath Thongudhiraikkuch Seeththim Maraththaal Aindhu Thoongalaich Seydhu, Avaigalaip Pondhakattaal Moodi, Avaigalukkup Pon Kokkigalai Undaakki, Avaigalukku Aindhu Vengalap Paadhangalai Vaarppikkakkadavaai.
